==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|仮|名|文}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|仮名|tr=kana}} and {{m|ja|文|tr=fumi||letter, document}}, which voices to -''bumi'' due to [[w:Rendaku|suffixation]].

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/kanabumi/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かなぶみ}}

# a letter written in [[w:Kana|kana]] script (as opposed to [[w:Kanji|kanji]])
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|86}}
#*: '''Canabumi'''. カナブミ (仮名文) 仮名(cana)文字で書いてある手紙.
